Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Rugrats - Go Wild + SpongeBob SquarePants - SuperSponge (Europe)
Game.plot: 2 Games In 1: SpongeBob SquarePants: SuperSponge / Rugrats Go Wild is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vicarious Visions and published by THQ,which was released in Europe in 2005.Cheat: Enter at the Password Screen.Cheat: When you are facing the final boss, go to the very left. If you stay there the boss cannot harm you in any way. To defeat the boss, just keep on jumping and pressing B.
